original_text: So when the Samaritans came to him, they urged him to stay with them, and he stayed two days.
korean_text: 사마리아인들이 예수께 와서 자기들과 함께 유하시기를 청하니 거기서 이틀을 유하시매

sentences.original_text: So when the Samaritans came to him
they urged him to stay with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그에게 그들과 함께 머물라고 간청했고
